reviews.review: Jogo muito bom, gráficos ótimos, jogabilidade incrível e é muito viciante o jogo. Mais o maior erro da valve foi ter deixado essa maravilha de graça, um erro muito sério e decepcionante!. Mais alem disso eu recomendo.

CSGO became free a couple month ago and in the aspect of adding a battle royale gamemode, that was a very smart decision to do. In reality, the game is almost unplayable if you do not have Prime Matchmaking, and even with prime matchmaking, there are still so many hackers. Finding so many hackers in prime matchmaking may be due to my low trust factor(which I have no idea how I got) but, in the end, making the game free put a damper on the competitive matchmaking side of things while making the game easier for new players to join. I personally think the increase in new "people" that joined, either left due to hackers or are people who made a smurf or people who made new accounts to hack on. I think the company is putting all their resources into making the battle royale better compared to fixing the original game itself. A good start to making the game better or at least showing the game is being worked on is bring out with a new operation which gives new players the experience of a operation and gives old players something new to do. If you haven't tried this game, try it out and review the game with your own good or bad experience.

This is a great game for anyone interested in competitive fps games. For the best experience and easiest way to level up each week for the drops, just play a game or two of comp for a quick boost in XP.  Even though there are so many maps and weapons, the game still manages to feel balanced. Sink tons of your time into just learning the different spray patterns of each weapon. This game really does come down to skill over luck(For the most part).

Not just a game, but a lifestyle. This is a competitor's trap, if you like very competitive games and strive to be the best in games you are at home with this game. The game isn't perfect and smurfs/cheaters can ruin a match but having good trust factor minimizes this.
